page.title: 16West urban edge of Preston
page.content: Area reference 5130 is mostly residential and contains the majority of the private housing to be found in the study area. It can be divided in to two main areas separated by Blackpool Road (A5083). On the north side are semi-detached houses built just before the Second World War (circa. 1930s). To the south some of the houses are of similar age but others are older, some dating back to the 19th.century. Among these older houses are many churches including St. Andrews and Sacred Heart. Blackpool Road is the main road out of Preston in a westerly direction and has several shops, garages, etc. along its length. The Preston to Blackpool railway line also passes through the square as do several bus routes. (continued on page 17)
